name: I'm Lost (itch) (Blackcat Studios)
description:
I'm Lost is a short pixel game with a serious tone. Even though it has a

pixel style it still has a unique look and feel. It is about a man/woman fighting

depression, suicide and alcoholism. I hope this game can make a change for some people

in a better way. One can only hope though. The game in total is probably only 15 minutes

long but has some heart pounding moments. I poured a lot of emotion into this title. If

you can relate to it.. I'm sorry and I hope things get better for you. Just keep you head

up!
